name: The Calamity Coil
description:
You are stuck. Someone put you here. You do not remember how, or why, but you must escape.

Semi-story based. Find the notes to unravel the mystery and escape.

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

LMB - Attack
RMB - Block
E - Read Note
WASD - Movement

Controller (recommended):

RT - Attack
LT - Block
A - Read Note
Left Stick - Movement
